mapper.select:
/*cargoLoading.selectCargoLoadingList*/ WITH WH_BAL_AMOUNT AS (SELECT SUM (L.PKG_QTY) AS BALQTY, SUM (L.CG_WGT) AS BALMT, SUM (L.CG_VOL) AS BALM3, J.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO AS CG_NO, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO FROM TMT_INV_LOC L INNER JOIN TMT_JOB J ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND L.CG_NO = J.CG_NO INNER JOIN TMT_GR G ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.CG_NO = G.GR_NO WHERE L.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} GROUP BY J.VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO),
APRON_BAL_AMOUNT AS (SELECT J.VSL_CALL_ID, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO, ISNULL(SUM( CASE J.JOB_PURP_CD WHEN 'WA' THEN J.CG_WGT ELSE -J.CG_WGT END), 0) AS BALMT, ISNULL( SUM ( CASE J.JOB_PURP_CD WHEN 'WA' THEN J.PKG_QTY ELSE -J.PKG_QTY END ), 0) AS BALQTY, ISNULL( SUM ( CASE J.JOB_PURP_CD WHEN 'WA' THEN J.CG_VOL ELSE -J.CG_VOL END ), 0) AS BALM3 FROM TMT_JOB J INNER JOIN TMT_GR G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.GR_NO WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA', 'AV') GROUP BY J.VSL_CALL_ID, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO),
CUSTOMS_RELEASE AS ( SELECT CUS.status FROM ( ( SELECT SN.VSL_CALL_ID, SN.MF_DOC_ID FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE SN WHERE SN.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND MF_DOC_ID = #{mfDocId} GROUP BY SN.VSL_CALL_ID, SN.MF_DOC_ID ) SHIPGNOTE INNER JOIN ( SELECT CASE CUST_MSG_MODE WHEN 'C' THEN 'RELEASE' ELSE 'HOLD' END AS status, BK_NO as MFDOCID, VSL_ID AS VSLCALLID FROM TMT_GCS_RECV WHERE 1 = 1 AND VSL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND BK_NO = #{mfDocId} AND IE_CD = 'E' AND CUST_MSG_TP = 'N' AND SEQ03 = ( SELECT MAX(SEQ03) FROM TMT_GCS_RECV WHERE 1 = 1 AND VSL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND BK_NO = #{mfDocId} AND IE_CD = 'E' AND CUST_MSG_TP = 'N' GROUP BY VSL_ID, IE_CD, BK_NO ) ) CUS ON CUS.VSLCALLID = SHIPGNOTE.VSL_CALL_ID AND CUS.MFDOCID = SHIPGNOTE.MF_DOC_ID ) )
SELECT TOP(1) A.VSL_CD AS VSLCD, A.CALL_YEAR AS CALLYEAR, A.CALL_SEQ AS CALLSEQ, G.GR_NO AS CGNO, G.GR_NO AS GRNO, G.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSLCALLID, G.SHIP_CALL_NO AS SCN, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AS SHIPGNOTENO, A.MF_DOC_ID AS MFDOCID, P.VSL_NM AS VSLNM, C.STAT_CD AS STAT, C.LOAD_CNCL_MODE AS LOADCNCLMODE, C.RHDL_MODE AS RHDLMODE, FORMAT(C.HDL_IN_END_DT, 'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm') AS HDLINENDDT, ISNULL(CAST (A.PKG_QTY AS NUMERIC(10,0)), 0) AS SNQTY, ISNULL(CAST (REPLACE (ISNULL(A.CG_WGT, 0), ',', '') AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) AS SNMT, ISNULL(CAST (A.CG_VOL AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) AS SNM3, ISNULL(CAST (G.PKG_QTY AS NUMERIC(10,0)), 0) AS DOCQTY, ISNULL(CAST (REPLACE (ISNULL(G.CG_WGT, 0), ',', '') AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) AS DOCMT, ISNULL(CAST (G.CG_VOL AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) AS DOCM3,
CASE ISNULL(O.BALQTY, 0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST (G.PKG_QTY AS NUMERIC(10,0)), 0) ELSE O.BALQTY END AS QTY,
CASE ISNULL(O.BALMT, 0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST (REPLACE (ISNULL(G.CG_WGT, 0), ',', '') AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) ELSE O.BALMT END AS MT,
CASE ISNULL(O.BALM3, 0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST (G.CG_VOL AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) ELSE O.BALM3 END AS M3,
CASE ISNULL(O.BALQTY, 0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST (G.PKG_QTY AS NUMERIC(10,0)), 0) ELSE O.BALQTY END AS LOADQTY,
CASE ISNULL(O.BALMT, 0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST (REPLACE (ISNULL(G.CG_WGT, 0), ',', '') AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) ELSE O.BALMT END AS LOADMT,
CASE ISNULL(O.BALM3, 0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST (G.CG_VOL AS NUMERIC(15,3)), 0) ELSE O.BALM3 END AS LOADM3,
CAST (ISNULL(O.BALQTY, 0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) AS BALQTY, CAST (ISNULL(O.BALMT, 0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALMT, CAST (ISNULL(O.BALM3, 0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALM3,
CAST(ISNULL(G.PKG_QTY,0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) - CAST(ISNULL(C.PKG_QTY,0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) AS BALQTY, CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(G.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)) - CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(C.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALMT, CAST(ISNULL(G.CG_VOL,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) - CAST(ISNULL(C.CG_VOL,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALM3,
G.TSPT_TP_CD AS TSPTTPCD, A.TSPT_COMP AS TSPTR, (SELECT TOP(1) ENG_SNM FROM TMT_PTNR WHERE PTNR_TYPE = 'TRK' AND PTNR_CODE = A.TSPT_COMP) AS TSPTRNM, A.DELV_TP_CD AS DELVTPCD, A.CATG_CD AS CATGCD, ISNULL(C.WH_FNL_DELV_YN, 'N') AS WHFNLDELVYN, G.CMDT_CD AS CMDTCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS PKGTPCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS REPKGTYPECD, A.CG_WGT_UNIT AS WGTUNIT, A.CG_VOL_UNIT AS MSRMTUNIT, A.POD AS PORTOFLOAD, A.POD AS PORTOFDIS, A.FDEST AS FDEST, ISNULL(C.CG_TP_CD, A.CG_TP_CD) AS CGTPCD, DBO.F_CM_CODE_NM ('MT', 'CGTP', A.CG_TP_CD) AS CGTPCDNM, A.DELV_TP_CD AS OPDELVTPCD, A.FWRD AS FWRAGNT, A.SHIPG_AGNCY AS SHPGAGENT, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM (JO.PKG_QTY), 0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG, TMT_JOB JO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID = CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV', 'AV')) AS ACCUSUMQTY, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM (JO.CG_WGT), 0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID = CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV', 'AV')) AS ACCUSUMWGT, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM (JO.CG_VOL), 0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID = CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV', 'AV')) AS ACCUSUMMSRMT, A.CNSNE AS CNSNE, A.CNSNE_NM AS CNSNENM, A.SHPR AS SHPR, A.SHPR_NM AS SHPRNM, CUS.STATUS AS CUSTMODE, CASE A.STAT_CD WHEN 'AP' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SNLDYN, CASE WHEN C.LOAD_END_DT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS FNLLOADYN,
A.EACH_WGT AS EACHMT, A.EACH_VOL AS EACHM3, CAST (ISNULL(A1.BALMT, 0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS avBalMt, CAST (ISNULL(A1.BALM3, 0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS avBalM3, CAST (ISNULL(A1.BALQTY, 0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) AS avBalQty, A.CMDT_GRP_CD AS CMDTGRPCD, ISNULL(G.ADDITIONAL_CHK, 'N') AS additionalCheckYn, ISNULL(G.WGT_CHK, 'Y') AS WEIGHTCHECKYN, ISNULL(C.REPKG_TP_CD, A.PKG_TP_CD) AS REPKGTPCD, A.DOMESTIC_CHK AS DOMESTICCHK
, DBO.F_GET_SHIFT_CD(CONVERT(DATETIME, #{shftDt}, 103), 'CD') AS SHFTID , DBO.F_GET_SHIFT_CD(CONVERT(DATETIME, #{shftDt}, 103), 'NM') AS SHFTNM
,SCH.ATB AS ATB, A.PROJECT_CARGO AS projectCargo FROM TMT_VSL_SCH SCH, TMT_SHIPG_NOTE A LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_GR G ON A.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_CG_MST C ON A.VSL_CALL_ID = C.VSL_CALL_ID AND C.CG_NO = G.GR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_VSL_PART P ON A.VSL_CD = P.VSL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN WH_BAL_AMOUNT O ON A.VSL_CALL_ID = O.VSL_CALL_ID AND A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = O.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND G.GR_NO = O.CG_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN APRON_BAL_AMOUNT A1 ON A.VSL_CALL_ID = A1.VSL_CALL_ID AND A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = A1.SHIPG_NOTE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN CUSTOMS_RELEASE CUS ON 1=1
WHERE A.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND G.GR_NO = #{grNo}
AND SCH.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}

SELECT TOP(1) /*cargoLoading.selectCargoLoadingList_BK*/ A.VSL_CD AS VSLCD, A.CALL_YEAR AS CALLYEAR, A.CALL_SEQ AS CALLSEQ, G.GR_NO AS CGNO, G.GR_NO AS GRNO, G.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSLCALLID, G.GR_NO AS GRNO, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AS SHIPGNOTENO, A.MF_DOC_ID AS MFDOCID, P.VSL_NM AS VSLNM, C.STAT_CD AS STAT, C.LOAD_CNCL_MODE AS LOADCNCLMODE, C.RHDL_MODE AS RHDLMODE, CASE WHEN (SELECT '1' FROM TMT_CG_BAL WHERE STAT_CD ='OVR' AND CG_NO = #{grNo} AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}) IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS SPRYN, C.DMG_YN AS DMGYN, FORMAT(C.HDL_IN_END_DT, 'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm') AS HDLINENDDT, ISNULL(CAST(A.PKG_QTY AS NUMERIC(10,0)),0) AS SNQTY, ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(A.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) AS SNMT, ISNULL(CAST(A.CG_VOL AS FLOAT),0) AS SNM3, ISNULL(CAST(G.PKG_QTY AS INT),0) AS DOCQTY, ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(G.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) AS DOCMT, ISNULL(CAST(G.CG_VOL AS FLOAT),0) AS DOCM3, CASE ISNULL(O.ACTQTY,0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST(G.PKG_QTY AS NUMERIC(10,0)),0) ELSE O.ACTQTY END AS QTY, CASE ISNULL(O.ACTMT,0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(G.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) ELSE O.ACTMT END AS MT, CASE ISNULL(O.ACTM3,0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST(G.CG_VOL AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) ELSE O.ACTM3 END AS M3, CASE ISNULL(O.ACTQTY,0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST(G.PKG_QTY AS NUMERIC(10,0)),0) ELSE CAST(ISNULL(J1.BALQTY,0) AS INT) END AS LOADQTY, CASE ISNULL(O.ACTMT,0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(G.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) ELSE CAST(ISNULL(J1.BALMT,0) AS FLOAT) END AS LOADMT, CASE ISNULL(O.ACTM3,0) WHEN 0 THEN ISNULL(CAST(G.CG_VOL AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) ELSE CAST(ISNULL(J1.BALM3,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) END AS LOADM3,
CAST(ISNULL(J1.BALQTY,0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) AS BALQTY, CAST(ISNULL(J1.BALMT,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALMT, CAST(ISNULL(J1.BALM3,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALM3, CAST(ISNULL(J2.WHDMGBALQTY,0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) AS WHDMGBALQTY, CAST(ISNULL(J2.WHDMGBALMT,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS WHDMGBALMT, CAST(ISNULL(J2.WHDMGBALM3,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS WHDMGBALM3,
CAST(ISNULL(G.PKG_QTY,0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) - CAST(ISNULL(C.PKG_QTY,0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) AS BALQTY, CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(G.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)) - CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(C.CG_WGT,0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALMT, CAST(ISNULL(G.CG_VOL,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) - CAST(ISNULL(C.CG_VOL,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS BALM3, CAST(ISNULL(J2.WHDMGBALQTY,0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)) AS WHDMGBALQTY, CAST(ISNULL(J2.WHDMGBALMT,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS WHDMGBALMT, CAST(ISNULL(J2.WHDMGBALM3,0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)) AS WHDMGBALM3,
G.TSPT_TP_CD AS TSPTTPCD, D.LORRY_NO AS LORRYNO, D.SEQ AS SEQ, A.TSPT_COMP AS TSPTR, (SELECT ENG_SNM FROM TMT_PTNR WHERE PTNR_TYPE = 'TRK' AND PTNR_CODE = A.TSPT_COMP) AS TSPTRNM,
A.DELV_TP_CD AS DELVTPCD, A.CATG_CD AS CATGCD, ISNULL(C.WH_FNL_DELV_YN,'N') AS WHFNLDELVYN, G.CMDT_CD AS CMDTCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS PKGTPCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS REPKGTYPECD, A.CG_WGT_UNIT AS WGTUNIT, A.CG_VOL_UNIT AS MSRMTUNIT, A.POD AS PORTOFLOAD, A.POD AS PORTOFDIS, A.FDEST AS FDEST, ISNULL(C.CG_TP_CD, A.CG_TP_CD) AS CGTPCD, DBO.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CGTP', A.CG_TP_CD) AS CGTPCDNM, A.DELV_TP_CD AS OPDELVTPCD, A.FWRD AS FWRAGNT, A.SHIPG_AGNCY AS SHPGAGENT,
(SELECT ISNULL(SUM(JO.PKG_QTY),0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID = CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WV', 'GV', 'AV')) AS ACCUSUMQTY, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(JO.CG_WGT),0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID = CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WV', 'GV', 'AV')) AS ACCUSUMWGT, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(JO.CG_VOL),0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID = CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WV', 'GV', 'AV')) AS ACCUSUMMSRMT, A.CNSNE AS CNSNE, A.CNSNE_NM AS CNSNENM, A.SHPR AS SHPR, A.SHPR_NM AS SHPRNM, ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT SUM(LC.CG_WGT) SUMWGT, SUM(LC.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY, LC.LOC_ID FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO WHERE LC.WH_TP_CD ='G' AND J.DELV_TP_CD = 'I' AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND (J.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD ='' OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD ='N')
GROUP BY LC.LOC_ID) A WHERE A.SUMWGT > 0 OR A.PKGQTY > 0),0) AS LOCCOUNT, ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT SUM(LC.CG_WGT) SUMWGT, SUM(LC.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY, LC.LOC_ID FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO WHERE LC.WH_TP_CD ='D' AND J.DELV_TP_CD = 'I' AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND (J.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD ='' OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD ='N')
GROUP BY LC.LOC_ID) A WHERE A.SUMWGT > 0 OR A.PKGQTY > 0),0) AS LOCDMGCOUNT, ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) LOCSPRCOUNT FROM (SELECT SUM(LC.CG_WGT) SUMWGT, SUM(LC.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO, LC.LOC_ID FROM TMT_JOB J JOIN TMT_INV_LOC LC ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_GR G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.GR_NO WHERE LC.WH_TP_CD ='G' AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD = 'S' AND G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
GROUP BY G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO, LC.LOC_ID) A WHERE A.SUMWGT > 0 OR A.PKGQTY > 0 ),0) AS LOCSPRCOUNT, ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) LOCSPRGRCOUNT FROM (SELECT SUM(LC.CG_WGT) SUMWGT, SUM(LC.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY, G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO, LC.LOC_ID, LC.CG_NO FROM TMT_JOB J JOIN TMT_INV_LOC LC ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_GR G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.GR_NO WHERE LC.WH_TP_CD ='G' AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD = 'S' AND G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
GROUP BY G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO, LC.LOC_ID, LC.CG_NO) A WHERE A.SUMWGT > 0 OR A.PKGQTY > 0),0) AS LOCSPRGRCOUNT, (SELECT CASE WHEN CUS.DOC_NO IS NULL OR CUS.DOC_NO ='' THEN 'HOLD' WHEN CUS.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND CUS.DOC_NO <>'' AND CUS.RELEASE_MT IS NULL THEN 'RELEASE' ELSE 'RELEASE' END AS status FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE SN LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DOC_NO, REF_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, SUM (RELEASE_MT) AS RELEASE_MT, SUM (RELEASE_QTY) AS RELEASE_QTY FROM TMT_CUSTOMS_RELEASE GROUP BY DOC_NO, REF_NO, VSL_CALL_ID) CUS ON CUS.VSL_CALL_ID = SN.VSL_CALL_ID AND ((CUS.REF_NO IS NULL OR CUS.REF_NO ='' AND CUS.DOC_NO = SN.MF_DOC_ID) OR (CUS.REF_NO IS NOT NULL AND CUS.REF_NO <>'' AND CUS.REF_NO = SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO)) WHERE SN.VSL_CALL_ID = A.VSL_CALL_ID AND SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AS CUSTMODE, 0 AS SPRQTY, 0 AS SPRMT, 0 AS SPRM3, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(L.PKG_QTY) AS SPRBALQTY FROM TMT_INV_LOC L JOIN TMT_JOB J ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO JOIN TMT_CG_MST M ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = M.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = M.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = M.CG_NO WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND M.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_CO_CD IN ('G') AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD = 'S' AND (J.RHDL_MODE IS NULL OR J.RHDL_MODE ='' OR J.RHDL_MODE = 'N')),0) AS SPRBALQTY, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(L.CG_WGT) AS SPRBALMT FROM TMT_INV_LOC L JOIN TMT_JOB J ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO JOIN TMT_CG_MST M ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = M.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = M.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = M.CG_NO WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND M.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_CO_CD IN ('G') AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD = 'S' AND (J.RHDL_MODE IS NULL OR J.RHDL_MODE ='' OR J.RHDL_MODE = 'N')),0) AS SPRBALMT, ISNULL((SELECT SUM(L.CG_VOL) AS SPRBALM3 FROM TMT_INV_LOC L JOIN TMT_JOB J ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO JOIN TMT_CG_MST M ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = M.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = M.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = M.CG_NO WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND M.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND J.JOB_CO_CD IN ('G') AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD = 'S' AND (J.RHDL_MODE IS NULL OR J.RHDL_MODE ='' OR J.RHDL_MODE = 'N')),0) AS SPRBALM3, CASE A.STAT_CD WHEN 'AP' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SNLDYN, CASE WHEN C.LOAD_END_DT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS FNLLOADYN
,CONVERT(DATETIME, (SELECT FORMAT(CONVERT(date,#{shftDt}, 112) ,'dd/MM/yyyy') + ' '+ CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONCAT(LEFT(S.FM_HHMM, 2), ':', RIGHT(S.FM_HHMM, 2))) AS STARTDT FROM TMT_SHFT S WHERE S.SHFT_METH_CD ='Standard' AND S.VLD_YN = 'Y' AND S.SHFT_ID=#{shftId} ),103) AS STARTDT ,CONVERT(DATETIME,(SELECT CASE WHEN CAST(S.TO_HHMM AS INT) <= CAST(S.FM_HHMM AS INT) THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(DAY, 1, CONVERT(DATE, #{shftDt}, 112)), 103) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONCAT(LEFT(S.TO_HHMM, 2), ':', RIGHT(S.TO_HHMM, 2))) ELSE FORMAT(CONVERT(date,#{shftDt}, 112) ,'dd/MM/yyyy') + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONCAT(LEFT(S.TO_HHMM, 2), ':', RIGHT(S.TO_HHMM, 2))) END AS ENDDT FROM TMT_SHFT S WHERE S.SHFT_METH_CD ='Standard' AND S.VLD_YN = 'Y' AND S.SHFT_ID=#{shftId}),103) AS ENDDT
,(SELECT TOP(1) JJ.RMK FROM TMT_JOB JJ WHERE JJ.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND JJ.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND JJ.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV','WA','WV','AG','GA') AND JJ.RMK IS NOT NULL AND JJ.RMK <>'' AND JJ.RHDL_GROUP_NO IS NULL OR JJ.RHDL_GROUP_NO ='' AND JJ.UPDATE_TIME = (SELECT MAX(J.UPDATE_TIME) FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV','WA','WV','AG','GA') AND (J.RMK IS NOT NULL AND J.RMK <>'') AND (J.RHDL_GROUP_NO IS NULL OR J.RHDL_GROUP_NO =''))) AS RMK, A.EACH_WGT AS EACHMT, A.EACH_VOL AS EACHM3, (SELECT ISNULL( SUM( CASE J1.JOB_PURP_CD WHEN 'GA' THEN J1.CG_WGT WHEN 'WA' THEN J1.CG_WGT ELSE -J1.CG_WGT END ), 0) FROM TMT_JOB J1 WHERE J1.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J1.CG_NO IN (SELECT GR_NO FROM TMT_GR G1 WHERE G1.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND J1.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GA', 'WA', 'AV')) avBalMt, (SELECT ISNULL( SUM( CASE J1.JOB_PURP_CD WHEN 'GA' THEN J1.CG_VOL WHEN 'WA' THEN J1.CG_VOL ELSE -J1.CG_VOL END ) ,0) FROM TMT_JOB J1 WHERE J1.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J1.CG_NO IN (SELECT GR_NO FROM TMT_GR G1 WHERE G1.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND J1.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GA', 'WA', 'AV')) avBalM3, (SELECT ISNULL( SUM( CASE J1.JOB_PURP_CD WHEN 'GA' THEN J1.PKG_QTY WHEN 'WA' THEN J1.PKG_QTY ELSE -J1.PKG_QTY END ) ,0) FROM TMT_JOB J1 WHERE J1.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J1.CG_NO IN (SELECT GR_NO FROM TMT_GR G1 WHERE G1.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND J1.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GA', 'WA', 'AV')) avBalQty, A.CMDT_GRP_CD CMDTGRPCD ,ISNULL(G.ADDITIONAL_CHK, 'N') AS additionalCheckYn ,ISNULL(G.WGT_CHK , 'Y') AS WEIGHTCHECKYN ,ISNULL(C.REPKG_TP_CD, A.PKG_TP_CD) AS REPKGTPCD FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE A, TMT_VSL_SCH S, TMT_VSL_PART P LEFT JOIN TMT_GR G ON A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND A.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN TMT_CG_MST C ON G.GR_NO = C.CG_NO AND G.VSL_CALL_ID = C.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN TMT_INV_LOC I ON G.GR_NO = I.CG_NO AND G.VSL_CALL_ID = I.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(L.PKG_QTY),0) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.PKG_QTY),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('G', 'D') AND (R.RHDL_MODE IS NULL OR R.RHDL_MODE ='' OR R.RHDL_MODE = 'N') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS ACTQTY, ISNULL(SUM(L.CG_WGT),0) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_WGT),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('G', 'D') AND (R.RHDL_MODE IS NULL OR R.RHDL_MODE ='' OR R.RHDL_MODE = 'N') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS ACTMT, ISNULL(SUM(L.CG_VOL),0) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_VOL),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('G', 'D') AND (R.RHDL_MODE IS NULL OR R.RHDL_MODE ='' OR R.RHDL_MODE = 'N') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS ACTM3, J.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO AS CG_NO FROM TMT_INV_LOC L JOIN TMT_JOB J ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO WHERE J.JOB_CO_CD IN ('G','D') AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD ='' AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND J.DELV_TP_CD = 'I' AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD =''
GROUP BY J.VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO) O ON C.CG_NO = O.CG_NO AND C.VSL_CALL_ID = O.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(L.PKG_QTY) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.PKG_QTY),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('G') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS BALQTY , SUM(L.CG_WGT) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_WGT),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('G') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS BALMT, SUM(L.CG_VOL) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_VOL),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('G') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS BALM3, J.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO AS CG_NO FROM TMT_INV_LOC L JOIN TMT_JOB J ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO WHERE L.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.JOB_CO_CD IN ('G') AND J.DELV_TP_CD = 'I' AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD =''
GROUP BY J.VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO) J1 ON C.CG_NO = J1.CG_NO AND C.VSL_CALL_ID = J1.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT SUM(L.PKG_QTY) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.PKG_QTY),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('D') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS WHDMGBALQTY, SUM(L.CG_WGT) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_WGT),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('D') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS WHDMGBALMT, SUM(L.CG_VOL) - (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_VOL),0) FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R WHERE R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND R.CG_CO_CD IN ('D') AND R.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR R.SP_CA_CO_CD ='') AS WHDMGBALM3, J.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO AS CG_NO FROM TMT_INV_LOC L JOIN TMT_JOB J ON L.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO WHERE J.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.JOB_CO_CD IN ('D') AND J.DELV_TP_CD = 'I' AND J.SP_CA_CO_CD IS NULL OR J.SP_CA_CO_CD ='' GROUP BY J.VSL_CALL_ID, J.CG_NO) J2 ON C.CG_NO = J2.CG_NO AND C.VSL_CALL_ID = J2.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT MIN(AD.SEQ) as SEQ,AD.LORRY_NO AS LORRY_NO, AD.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, AD.CG_NO AS CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV AD WHERE AD.CG_NO = #{grNo} AND AD.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND AD.GATE_PASS_NO IS NULL OR AD.GATE_PASS_NO ='' AND AD.GATE_OUT_DT IS NULL OR AD.GATE_OUT_DT ='' GROUP BY AD.LORRY_NO, AD.VSL_CALL_ID,AD.CG_NO) D ON G.GR_NO = D.CG_NO AND G.VSL_CALL_ID = D.VSL_CALL_ID
WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = A.VSL_CALL_ID AND P.VSL_CD = S.VSL_CD
AND S.VSL_CALL_ID =#{vslCallId}
AND G.GR_NO =#{grNo}

SELECT DISTINCT /*cargoLoading.selectPiplineGrNo*/ GR_NO as GRNO FROM TMT_GR WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND SHIPG_NOTE_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND CHARINDEX (GR_NO, #{grNoPlStr}) >= 1 ORDER BY GR_NO ASC

SELECT /*cargoLoading.selectCargoRhdLoadingList*/ R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AS VSLCALLID, R.NX_REF_NO AS SHIPGNOTENO, R.NX_CG_NO AS CGNO, R.CG_NO AS ORGCGNO, R.ORG_REF_NO AS ORGBLSN, R.VSL_CALL_ID AS ORGVSLCALLID, R.RHDL_GROUP_NO AS RHDLGROUPNO, (SELECT VSL_NM FROM TMT_VSL_PART WHERE VSL_CD = S.VSL_CD) AS VSLNM, C.STAT_CD AS STAT, C.LOAD_CNCL_MODE AS LOADCNCLMODE, C.DMG_YN AS DMGYN, FORMAT(MAX(C.HDL_IN_END_DT) , 'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm' ) AS HDLINENDDT, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(SUM(AA.PKG_QTY) AS INT),0) FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE AA WHERE AA.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND AA.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.NX_REF_NO) AS SNQTY, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(SUM(AA.CG_WGT),0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE AA WHERE AA.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND AA.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.NX_REF_NO) AS SNMT, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(SUM(AA.CG_VOL) AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE AA WHERE AA.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND AA.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.NX_REF_NO) AS SNM3, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(SUM(GG.PKG_QTY) AS INT),0) FROM TMT_GR GG WHERE GG.GR_NO = R.NX_CG_NO AND GG.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID) AS DOCQTY, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE(ISNULL(SUM(GG.WGT),0),',','') AS NUMERIC(15,3)),0) /*WGT - missing column*/ FROM TMT_GR GG WHERE GG.GR_NO = R.NX_CG_NO AND GG.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID) AS DOCMT, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(SUM(GG.CG_VOL) AS FLOAT),0) FROM TMT_GR GG WHERE GG.GR_NO = R.NX_CG_NO AND GG.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID) AS DOCM3, ISNULL(SUM(R.PKG_QTY),0) AS QTY, ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_WGT),0) AS MT, ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_VOL),0) AS M3, ISNULL(SUM(R.PKG_QTY),0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(LC.PKG_QTY)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_RHDL_CG G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND J.JOB_CO_CD = G.CG_CO_CD WHERE ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') = ISNULL(G.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') AND G.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND G.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND G.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND G.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA')),0) AS LOADQTY, ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_WGT),0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(LC.CG_WGT)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_RHDL_CG G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND J.JOB_CO_CD = G.CG_CO_CD WHERE ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') = ISNULL(G.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') AND G.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND G.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND G.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND G.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA')),0) AS LOADMT, ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_VOL),0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(LC.CG_VOL)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_RHDL_CG G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND J.JOB_CO_CD = G.CG_CO_CD WHERE ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') = ISNULL(G.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') AND G.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND G.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND G.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND G.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA')),0) AS LOADM3, ISNULL(SUM(R.PKG_QTY),0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(LC.PKG_QTY)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_RHDL_CG G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND J.JOB_CO_CD = G.CG_CO_CD WHERE AND ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') = ISNULL(G.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') AND G.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND G.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND G.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND G.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA')),0) AS BALQTY, ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_WGT),0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(LC.CG_WGT)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_RHDL_CG G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND J.JOB_CO_CD = G.CG_CO_CD WHERE ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') = ISNULL(G.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') AND G.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND G.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND G.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND G.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA')),0) AS BALMT, ISNULL(SUM(R.CG_VOL),0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(LC.CG_VOL)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_RHDL_CG G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND J.JOB_CO_CD = G.CG_CO_CD WHERE ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') = ISNULL(G.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') AND G.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND G.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND G.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND G.RHDL_MODE = 'C' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA')),0) AS BALM3, G.TSPT_TP_CD AS TSPTTPCD, D.LORRY_NO AS LORRYID, D.SEQ AS SEQ, (SELECT ENG_SNM FROM TMT_PTNR WHERE PTNR_TYPE = 'TRK' AND PTNR_CODE = A.TSPT_COMP) AS TSPTRNM, A.TSPT_COMP AS TSPTR,
A.DELV_TP_CD AS DELVTPCD, A.CATG_CD AS CATGCD, ISNULL(C.WH_FNL_DELV_YN,'N') AS WHFNLDELVYN, G.CMDT_CD AS CMDTCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS PKGTPCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS REPKGTYPECD, A.CG_WGT_UNIT AS WGTUNIT, A.CG_VOL_UNIT AS MSRMTUNIT, A.POL AS PORTOFLOAD, A.POD AS PORTOFDIS, A.FDEST AS FDEST, A.CG_TP_CD AS CGTPCD, A.DELV_TP_CD AS OPDELVTPCD, A.FWRD AS FWRAGNT, A.SHIPG_AGNCY AS SHPGAGENT,
(SELECT ISNULL(SUM(JO.PKG_QTY),0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.NX_REF_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID =CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('AV')) AS ACCUSUMQTY, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(JO.CG_WGT),0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.NX_REF_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID =CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('AV')) AS ACCUSUMWGT, (SELECT ISNULL(SUM(JO.CG_VOL),0) FROM TMT_CG_MST CG JOIN TMT_JOB JO ON CG.VSL_CALL_ID = JO.VSL_CALL_ID AND CG.CG_NO = JO.CG_NO WHERE CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.NX_REF_NO AND CG.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AND JO.CG_NO IN (SELECT MST.CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_MST MST WHERE MST.VSL_CALL_ID =CG.VSL_CALL_ID AND MST.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = CG.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AND JO.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('AV')) AS ACCUSUMMSRMT, A.CNSNE AS CNSNE, A.CNSNE_NM AS CNSNENM, A.SHPR AS SHPR, A.SHPR_NM AS SHPRNM, (SELECT CASE WHEN CUS.DOC_NO IS NULL OR CUS.DOC_NO ='' THEN 'HOLD' WHEN CUS.DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND CUS.DOC_NO <>'' AND CUS.RELEASE_MT IS NULL THEN 'RELEASE' ELSE 'RELEASE' END AS status FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE SN LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DOC_NO, REF_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, SUM (RELEASE_MT) AS RELEASE_MT, SUM (RELEASE_QTY) AS RELEASE_QTY FROM TMT_CUSTOMS_RELEASE GROUP BY DOC_NO, REF_NO, VSL_CALL_ID) CUS ON CUS.VSL_CALL_ID = SN.VSL_CALL_ID AND ((CUS.REF_NO IS NULL OR CUS.REF_NO ='' AND CUS.DOC_NO = SN.MF_DOC_ID) OR (CUS.REF_NO IS NOT NULL AND CUS.REF_NO <>'' AND CUS.REF_NO = SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO)) WHERE SN.VSL_CALL_ID = A.VSL_CALL_ID AND SN.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) AS CUSTMODE, S.SHIP_CALL_NO AS SHIPCALLNO, A.CBR_NO AS CBRNO, CASE A.STAT_CD WHEN 'AP' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SNLDYN, CASE WHEN MAX(C.LOAD_END_DT) IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS FNLLOADYN, ISNULL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT SUM(LC.CG_WGT) SUMWGT, SUM(LC.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY, LC.LOC_ID FROM TMT_INV_LOC LC JOIN TMT_JOB J ON LC.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND LC.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND LC.CG_NO = J.CG_NO JOIN TMT_RHDL_CG G ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND J.JOB_CO_CD = G.CG_CO_CD WHERE ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') = ISNULL(G.SP_CA_CO_CD,' ') AND G.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND G.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND G.RHDL_GROUP_NO =#{rhdlGroupNo} AND G.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND G.RHDL_MODE = 'C' GROUP BY (LC.LOC_ID)) A WHERE A.SUMWGT > 0 OR A.PKGQTY > 0),0) AS LOCCOUNT, COUNT(R.RHDL_NO) AS RHDLGROUPCNT, (SELECT CASE COUNT(RC.ORG_GR_NO) WHEN 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END FROM TMT_RHDL_CG RC WHERE RC.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND RC.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND RC.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND RC.NX_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo} AND RC.RHDL_MODE = 'C') AS GRYN, 'C' AS RHDLMODE
,CONVERT(DATETIME,(SELECT FORMAT(CONVERT(date,#{shftDt}, 112) ,'dd/MM/yyyy') + ' '+ CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONCAT(LEFT(S.FM_HHMM, 2), ':', RIGHT(S.FM_HHMM, 2))) AS STARTDT FROM TMT_SHFT S WHERE S.SHFT_METH_CD ='Standard' AND S.VLD_YN = 'Y' AND S.SHFT_ID=#{shftId})) AS SHIFTSTARTDT ,CONVERT(DATETIME,(SELECT CASE WHEN CAST(S.TO_HHMM AS INT) <= CAST(S.FM_HHMM AS INT) THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), DATEADD(DAY, 1, CONVERT(DATE, #{shftDt}, 112)), 103) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONCAT(LEFT(S.TO_HHMM, 2), ':', RIGHT(S.TO_HHMM, 2))) ELSE FORMAT(CONVERT(date,#{shftDt}, 112) ,'dd/MM/yyyy') + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONCAT(LEFT(S.TO_HHMM, 2), ':', RIGHT(S.TO_HHMM, 2))) END AS ENDDT FROM TMT_SHFT S WHERE S.SHFT_METH_CD ='Standard' AND S.VLD_YN = 'Y' AND S.SHFT_ID=#{shftId})) AS SHIFTENDDT
,(SELECT TOP(1) JJ.RMK FROM TMT_JOB JJ WHERE JJ.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND JJ.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND JJ.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV','WA','WV','AG','GA', 'AV') AND JJ.RMK IS NOT NULL AND JJ.RMK <>'' AND JJ.RHDL_GROUP_NO IS NOT NULL AND JJ.RHDL_GROUP_NO <>'' AND JJ.UPDATE_TIME = (SELECT MAX(J.UPDATE_TIME) FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GV','WA','WV','AG','GA','AV') AND J.RMK IS NOT NULL AND J.RMK <>'' AND J.RHDL_GROUP_NO IS NOT NULL AND J.RHDL_GROUP_NO <>'')) AS RMK FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R, TMT_VSL_SCH S
LEFT JOIN TMT_GR G ON G.GR_NO = R.NX_CG_NO AND G.VSL_CALL_ID = R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN TMT_SHIPG_NOTE A ON A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND A.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN TMT_CG_MST C ON C.CG_NO = G.GR_NO AND C.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT MIN(AD.SEQ) AS SEQ, AD.LORRY_NO AS LORRY_NO, AD.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, AD.CG_NO AS CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV AD WHERE AD.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND AD.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND AD.GATE_PASS_NO IS NULL OR AD.GATE_PASS_NO ='' AND AD.GATE_OUT_DT IS NULL OR AD.GATE_OUT_DT ='' GROUP BY AD.LORRY_NO, AD.VSL_CALL_ID, AD.CG_NO) D ON G.GR_NO = D.CG_NO AND G.VSL_CALL_ID = D.VSL_CALL_ID
WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = A.VSL_CALL_ID
AND R.NX_CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND R.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo}
AND A.CATG_CD = 'T'
AND A.CATG_CD = 'R'
AND G.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}
AND G.GR_NO = #{cgNo}
AND r.org_ref_no = #{orgrefno}
GROUP BY R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID, R.NX_REF_NO, R.NX_CG_NO, R.CG_NO, R.ORG_REF_NO, R.VSL_CALL_ID, A.VSL_CALL_ID, A.SHIPG_NOTE_NO, R.RHDL_GROUP_NO, A.TSPT_COMP, S.VSL_CD, C.STAT_CD, C.LOAD_CNCL_MODE, C.DMG_YN, G.TSPT_TP_CD, D.LORRY_NO, D.SEQ, A.STAT_CD, A.DELV_TP_CD, A.CATG_CD, C.WH_FNL_DELV_YN, G.CMDT_CD, G.PKG_TP_CD, A.CG_WGT_UNIT, A.CG_VOL_UNIT, A.POL, A.POD, A.FDEST, A.CG_TP_CD, A.DELV_TP_CD, A.FWRD, A.SHIPG_AGNCY,
A.CNSNE, A.CNSNE_NM, A.SHPR, A.SHPR_NM, S.SHIP_CALL_NO, A.CBR_NO

SELECT /*cargoLoading.selectCargoRhdlDtlLoading*/ B.NX_CG_NO AS CGNO, B.NX_VSL_CALL_ID AS VSLCALLID, B.NX_REF_NO AS SHIPGNOTENO, B.RHDL_NO AS RHDLNO, B.PKG_QTY AS QTY, B.CG_WGT AS MT, B.CG_VOL AS M3, G.TSPT_TP_CD AS TSPTTPCD, D.LORRY_NO AS LORRYID, D.SEQ AS SEQ, S.TSPT_COMP AS TSPTR, (SELECT ENG_SNM FROM TMT_PTNR WHERE PTNR_TYPE = 'TRK' AND PTNR_CODE = S.TSPT_COMP) AS TSPTRNM,
S.DELV_TP_CD AS DELVTPCD, S.CATG_CD AS CATGCD, G.CMDT_CD AS CMDTCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS PKGTPCD, G.PKG_TP_CD AS REPKGTYPECD, S.CG_WGT_UNIT AS WGTUNIT, S.CG_VOL_UNIT AS MSRMTUNIT, S.POL AS PORTOFLOAD, S.POD AS PORTOFDIS, S.FDEST AS FDEST, S.CG_TP_CD AS CGTPCD, S.DELV_TP_CD AS OPDELVTPCD, S.FWRD AS FWRAGNT, S.SHIPG_AGNCY AS SHPGAGENT, S.CNTRY_OF_ORG AS CNTRYOFORG, /*NONEXIST Column*/ S.CNSNE AS CNSNE, S.CNSNE_NM AS CNSNENM, S.SHPR AS SHPR, S.SHPR_NM AS SHPRNM, B.VSL_CALL_ID AS ORGVSLCALLID, B.ORG_REF_NO AS ORGBLSN, B.ORG_GR_NO AS GRNO, B.CG_CO_CD AS JOBCOCD, B.SP_CA_CO_CD AS SPCACOCD, B.RHDL_MODE AS RHDLMODE, B.OPE_CLASS_CD AS ORGOPECLASSCD, B.CG_NO AS ORGCGNO, B.RHDL_GROUP_NO AS RHDLGROUPNO, CASE S.STAT_CD WHEN 'AP' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS SNLDYN, V.SHIP_CALL_NO AS SHIPCALLNO, S.CBR_NO AS CBRNO, ISNULL(B.PKG_QTY,0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(I.PKG_QTY)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC I JOIN TMT_JOB J ON I.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND I.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO WHERE I.VSL_CALL_ID = B.VSL_CALL_ID AND I.CG_NO = B.CG_NO AND J.RHDL_NO IS NOT NULL AND J.RHDL_NO <>'' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA') GROUP BY I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO ),0) AS BALQTY, ISNULL(B.CG_WGT,0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(I.CG_WGT)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC I JOIN TMT_JOB J ON I.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND I.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO WHERE I.VSL_CALL_ID = B.VSL_CALL_ID AND I.CG_NO = B.CG_NO AND J.RHDL_NO IS NOT NULL AND J.RHDL_NO <>'' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA') GROUP BY I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO ),0) AS BALMT, ISNULL(B.CG_VOL,0) - ISNULL((SELECT ABS(SUM(I.CG_VOL)) FROM TMT_INV_LOC I JOIN TMT_JOB J ON I.VSL_CALL_ID = J.VSL_CALL_ID AND I.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO WHERE I.VSL_CALL_ID = B.VSL_CALL_ID AND I.CG_NO = B.CG_NO AND J.RHDL_NO IS NOT NULL AND J.RHDL_NO <>'' AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WA') GROUP BY I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO ),0) AS BALM3 FROM TMT_RHDL_CG B INNER JOIN TMT_GR G ON B.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND B.NX_CG_NO = G.GR_NO AND B.NX_REF_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT MIN(AD.SEQ) AS SEQ, AD.LORRY_NO AS LORRY_NO, AD.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSL_CALL_ID, AD.CG_NO AS CG_NO FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV AD WHERE AD.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND AD.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND AD.GATE_PASS_NO IS NULL OR AD.GATE_PASS_NO ='' AND AD.GATE_OUT_DT IS NULL OR AD.GATE_OUT_DT ='' GROUP BY AD.LORRY_NO, AD.VSL_CALL_ID, AD.CG_NO) D ON B.NX_CG_NO = D.CG_NO AND B.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = D.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT JOIN TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S ON S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AND S.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID INNER JOIN TMT_VSL_SCH V ON V.VSL_CALL_ID = B.NX_VSL_CALL_ID WHERE B.VSL_CALL_ID = #{orgVslCallId} AND B.ORG_REF_NO = #{orgBlSn} AND B.RHDL_GROUP_NO = #{rhdlGroupNo} AND B.RHDL_MODE = 'C'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /*cargoLoading.insertCargoLoadingItems*/ TMT_CG_MST( /*MISSING COLUMN*/ VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, /*MISSING COLUMN*/ VSL_CALL_ID, SHIP_CALL_NO, CG_NO, OPE_CLASS_CD, TSPT_TP_CD, STAT_CD, LOAD_ST_DT, LOAD_END_DT, PKG_QTY, PKG_TP_CD, CG_WGT, CG_WGT_UNIT, CG_VOL, CG_VOL_UNIT, REPKG_QTY, REPKG_WGT, REPKG_MSRMT, REPKG_TP_CD, LOAD_CNCL_MODE, DMG_YN, RHDL_MODE, DELV_TP_CD, CG_TP_CD, CMDT_CD, CMDT_GRP_CD, SHIPG_AGNT, FWR_AGNT, CNTRY_OF_ORG, PORT_OF_LOAD, PORT_OF_DIS, FDEST, SHIPG_NOTE_NO, ACTL_DELV_TP_CD, LD_DMG_QTY, LD_DMG_MT, LD_DMG_M3, CNSNE, CNSNE_NM, SHPR, SHPR_NM, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, LORRY_NO, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{callSeq}, #{mfDocId}, #{vslCallId}, #{scn}, #{cgNo}, #{catgCd}, #{tsptTpCd}, #{stat}, #{startDt}, CASE #{fnlOpeYn} WHEN 'Y' THEN #{endDt} WHEN 'true' THEN #{endDt} ELSE null END, #{loadQty}, #{pkgTpCd}, #{loadMt}, #{wgtUnit}, #{loadM3}, #{msrmtUnit}, CAST(ISNULL(#{repkgQty},0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)), CAST(ISNULL(#{repkgWgt},0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)), CAST(ISNULL(#{repkgMsrmt},0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)), #{rePkgTpCd}, #{loadCnclMode}, #{dmgYn}, CASE #{rhdlYn} WHEN 'NULL' THEN 'N' WHEN '' THEN 'N' WHEN 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, #{delvTpCd}, #{cgTpCd}, #{cmdtCd}, #{cmdtGrpCd}, #{shpgAgent}, #{fwrAgnt}, #{cntryOfOrg}, #{portOfLoad}, #{portOfDis}, #{fdest}, #{shipgNoteNo}, #{opDelvTpCd}, CAST(ISNULL(#{loadDmgQty},0) AS NUMERIC(10,0)), CAST(ISNULL(#{loadDmgMt},0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)), CAST(ISNULL(#{loadDmgM3},0) AS NUMERIC(15,3)), #{shpr}, #{shprNm}, #{cnsne}, #{cnsneNm}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{lorryNo}, #{newVersion} )

SELECT 'J' + FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyMMdd') + RIGHT( '000000000' + ISNULL( CONCAT(MAX(CAST(RIGHT(JOB_NO, 9) AS INT)) + 1, ''), '000000000' ), 9 ) AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB
INSERT /*cargoLoading.insertJobItems*/ INTO TMT_JOB( VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, JOB_NO, JOB_TP_CD, WORK_ST_DT, WORK_END_DT, SHFT_ID, PKG_TP_CD, PKG_QTY, CG_VOL, CG_WGT, CNTR_QTY, EQ_NO, TO_LOC_ID, STAT_CD, CG_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, SHIP_CALL_NO, JOB_PURP_CD, DELV_TP_CD, FNL_OPE_YN, FNL_DELV_YN, HATCH_NO, HATCH_DRT, GANG_NO, OPE_CLASS_CD, DMG_YN, RHDL_MODE, SHU_YN, SHFT_DT, JOB_GROUP, LD_DMG_QTY, LD_DMG_MT, LD_DMG_M3, REPKG_QTY, REPKG_WGT, REPKG_MSRMT, REPKG_TP_CD, REPKG_TYPE_CD, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION, TSPT_TP_CD, JOB_CO_CD, SP_CA_CO_CD, RHDL_NO, JOB_ROOT, RC_CO_CD, RHDL_GROUP_NO, RMK, LORRY_NO, GATE_TXN_NO, BARGE_NO, WB_TRANSACTION_NO, DRIVER_ID, FORKLIFT_NO, PRIME_NO ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{callSeq}, #{mfDocId}, #{jobNo}, #{jobTpCd}, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{startDtStr},103), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{endDtStr},103), DBO.F_GET_SHIFT_CD(CONVERT(DATETIME, #{endDtStr},103), 'CD'), #{pkgTpCd}, #{loadQty}, #{loadM3}, #{loadMt}, #{cntrQty}, #{eqNo}, #{toLocId}, #{stat}, #{cgNo}, #{vslCallId}, #{scn}, #{jobPurpCd}, #{opDelvTpCd}, CASE #{fnlOpeYn} WHEN 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, #{fnlDelvYn}, #{hatchNo}, #{hatchDrt}, #{gangNo}, #{catgCd}, CASE WHEN #{dmgYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE '' END, #{rhdlMode}, CASE WHEN #{shuYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE '' END, CONVERT(date, #{shftDt},112), #{jobGroup}, CAST(ISNULL(#{loadDmgQty},0) AS NUMERIC(5, 0)), CAST(ISNULL(#{loadDmgMt},0) AS NUMERIC(15, 3)), CAST(ISNULL(#{loadDmgM3},0) AS NUMERIC(15, 3)), CAST(ISNULL(#{repkgQty},0) AS NUMERIC(5, 0)), CAST(ISNULL(#{repkgWgt},0) AS NUMERIC(15, 3)), CAST(ISNULL(#{repkgMsrmt},0) AS NUMERIC(15, 3)), #{rePkgTpCd}, #{rePkgTpCd}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion}, #{tsptTpCd}, #{jobCoCd}, #{spCaCoCd}, #{rhdlNo}, CASE WHEN #{jobPurpCd} = 'AW' THEN (SELECT J.JOB_NO AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND J.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup} AND J.JOB_CO_CD = #{jobCoCd} AND ISNULL(J.JOB_TP_CD, ' ') = TRY_CONVERT(NVARCHAR(4), 'LD') AND ISNULL(J.SP_CA_CO_CD, ' ') = ISNULL(TRY_CONVERT(NVARCHAR(1), #{spCaCoCd}), ' ') AND J.RHDL_MODE = TRY_CONVERT(NVARCHAR(4), #{rhdlMode}) ) ELSE NULL END, #{rcCoCd}, #{rhdlGroupNo}, #{rmk}, #{lorryNo}, #{gateTxnNo}, #{bargeNo}, #{wbTransactionNo}, #{driverId}, #{forkliftNo}, #{primeNo} )

insert.if: INSERT INTO /*cargoLoading.insertBalItems*/ TMT_CG_BAL( /*MISSING COLUMN*/ VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, /*MISSING COLUMN*/ SEQ, VSL_CALL_ID, SHIP_CALL_NO, CG_NO, STAT_CD, PKG_QTY, CG_WGT, CG_VOL, CHK_DT, JOB_NO, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{callSeq}, #{mfDocId}, (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 FROM TMT_CG_BAL WHERE VSL_CALL_ID=#{vslCallId} AND CG_NO=#{cgNo}), #{vslCallId}, #{scn}, #{cgNo}, #{balStatCd}, #{dmgQty}, #{dmgMt}, #{dmgM3}, SYSDATETIME(), #{jobNo}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion} )

INSERT INTO /*cargoLoading.insertRhdlItems*/ TMT_RHDL_CG( RHDL_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, SHIP_CALL_NO, ORG_REF_NO, NX_VSL_CALL_ID, NX_REF_NO, OPE_CLASS_CD, PKG_QTY, CG_WGT, CG_VOL, STS_YN, ORG_GR_NO, RHDL_MODE, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, JOB_NO, CG_CO_CD, SP_CA_CO_CD, CG_NO, VERSION, RHDL_GROUP_NO ) VALUES ( ('R' + FORMAT( SYSDATETIME(), 'yyMM') +(SELECT ISNULL(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, MAX(TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(RHDL_NO, LEN(RHDL_NO), 4) AS INT)) + 1), 4), '0000') FROM TMT_RHDL_CG)), #{vslCallId}, #{scn}, #{shipgNoteNo}, #{nxVslCallId}, #{nxRefNo}, #{catgCd}, #{loadQty}, #{loadMt}, #{loadM3}, #{stsYn}, #{cgNo}, #{rhdlMode}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{jobNo}, CASE WHEN #{jobCoCd} IS NULL THEN 'G' ELSE #{jobCoCd} END, #{spCaCoCd}, #{cgNo}, #{newVersion}, (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CAST(S.RHDL_GROUP_NO) AS INT),0)+1 AS RHDLGROUPNO FROM TMT_RHDL_CG S WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND S.ORG_REF_NO = #{shipgNoteNo}) )

VSL_CALL_ID, JOB_NO, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{callSeq}, #{mfDocId}, #{cgNo}, #{cgInOutCd}, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(MAX(SEQ) AS INT), 0)+1 FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE CG_NO=#{cgNo} AND CG_IN_OUT_CD = #{cgInOutCd} AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}), #{loadMt}, #{wgtUnit}, #{loadM3}, #{msrmtUnit}, #{loadQty}, #{pkgTpCd}, #{cmdtCd}, #{cgTpCd},

#{vslCallId}, #{jobNo}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion} )

INSERT INTO /*cargoLoading.insertLDGeneralGateInItems*/ TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV( /*MISSING COLUMN*/ VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, /*MISSING COLUMN*/ CG_NO, CG_IN_OUT_CD, SEQ, CG_WGT, CG_WGT_UNIT, CG_VOL, CG_VOL_UNIT, PKG_QTY, PKG_TP_CD, CMDT_CD, CG_TP_CD,
GATE_IN_DT, GATE_OUT_DT, TSPT_TP_CD, GR_NO, LOC_ID, RMK, LORRY_NO, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VSL_CALL_ID, SHIP_CALL_NO, JOB_NO, VERSION ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{callSeq}, #{mfDocId}, #{cgNo}, #{cgInOutCd}, (SELECT ISNULL(CAST(MAX(SEQ) AS INT), 0)+1 FROM TMT_CG_ARRV_DELV WHERE CG_NO=#{cgNo} AND CG_IN_OUT_CD = #{cgInOutCd} AND VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId}), #{loadMt}, #{wgtUnit}, #{loadM3}, #{msrmtUnit}, #{loadQty}, #{pkgTpCd}, #{cmdtCd}, #{cgTpCd},
#{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{tsptTpCd}, #{grNo}, #{locId}, #{rmk}, #{lorryNo}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{vslCallId}, #{scn}, CASE WHEN #{jobNo} IS NULL THEN (SELECT J.JOB_NO AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND J.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup} AND J.JOB_TP_CD = #{jobTpCd} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD = #{jobPurpCd} AND J.JOB_CO_CD = #{jobCoCd}) ELSE #{jobNo} END, #{newVersion})
